body:
# State of the Repo Report, February 2019

## Introduction

For all fans of statistics Ã¢ÂÂ enjoy! Ã°ÂÂ¤Â

The "median open pull request" adds 47.5 lines, removes 13 lines and touches 3 files.

The total set of open pull requests adds 42 064 lines, removes 13 721 lines and touches 1 629 distinct files.

The repo contains 481 587ÃÂ lines of text and 1 683ÃÂ files.

There are currently 258 open pull requests from in total 78 contributors.

If all open pull requests were merged the project line count would grow by roughly 5%.

Previous edition: [State of the Repo, January 2019](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/15180)
